question: Who created the tutorials listed in this document?
answer: The tutorials were created by our technical staff.

question: Will additional training sessions be made available?
answer: Yes, other training will be added as they become available.

question: What do participants receive after completing a tutorial?
answer: Participants will receive a certificate of participation at the end of each tutorial.

answer: No, in some cases, you must have an account with the Alliance.
